feature1.explanation: Both texts use standard punctuation marks such as commas and periods consistently.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit a similar level of formality and use of technical terms.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation, formality, coherence, tone, and error-free writing, the likelihood of the same author is moderately high.
